welcome_title2: is an indispensable tool for working on joint projects.
welcome_descr_text_3: ✔ improves the efficiency of task management.
about_us_descr_1: Team team leader. Developed the main page, the registration and authorization page, the user profile page. Implemented additional functionality. Participated in the development of the application design.
about_us_descr_2: Implemented the creation, deletion, editing of components on the board page using a modal window. Added a language change in the app. Participated in the design development.
about_us_descr_3: Implemented the creation of components on the board page. Developed the drag-n-drop functionality of columns and tasks. Added adaptability to the application.
